Lore.Text: Allona is the name of the Kingdom
The demons were once the people of Allona

Ulberic once had a Queen, her name was Flidais. 
Unfortunately she passed away which enraged Ulberic

The rivers in Allona flow red with the blood 
of Ulberic's victims

Queen Flidais was much loved by the people of Allona, 
and was known for her kindness and fearlessness in battle

The people loved King Ulberic, until the death of the 
Queen changed him, left him cruel and spiteful
The game Bloodloss was heavily inspired by Diablo 3

Loghaine was the trusted Captain of the Guard under 
Ulberic's rule, until the wrath of his King reformed 
him into a vile demon
